lender.name: TarunC
lender.loan_because: I find this to be the best way of contributing - helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies reorganize and improve their marketing, sales and service

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We're all members of a global community

lender.name: stevieflow
lender.loan_because: .. it just makes sense
lender.occupational_info: I try to make technology work for some good!

lender.name: Tracie
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Since attending T. Harv Ecker's Millionaire Mind Intensive in May '08, charity and giving have played a much bigger part in my life. If you're a student of Peak Potentials, you understand.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate investor, and am also working to launch a functional food procut.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I don't need anything for myself. When asked what I would like as a gift, I say "Kiva".
lender.occupational_info: I teach French to high school students.

lender.name: Vaughan & Shirley
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We no longer work, we are enjoying our 4 children and 7 grandchildren. Our home is in Perth Australia

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I like the idea to help directly someone to menage a business. It's a good way to give a right help.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have seen the situation in developing countries during travel and would like to support people to increase their living situation based on their own initiative.

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: Their are others worse off than myself and I am blessed to get what I do.
lender.occupational_info: I get a percentage of the price from each product which a person bye's from me.

lender.name: SAID SALIM
lender.loan_because:
Dear Sir I have been a tour guide all my life, and now I have an oppertunity to run a project comprising small bungalows on the beachside. All through my life i have never been able to save enough money. and i think this project of small bungalows would allow me and my family lead a decent life, without any more struggle. I have six chidlren and I wish to give them a good future. I would like to know from you, how i may apply for a loan through your site. Kindly guide me. Kind regards The proposal - Hotel for rent.
Cost of the hotel for the entire year is $ 2250 Cost of the hotel for 3 years 6x2250 $ 6750
The hotel consists of 3 rooms and 1 restaurant Average cost of each room will be 187.5 per month $ 46.87
Other costs each month includes staff salary, electric Equipments, incidental expenses, license cost For the entire hotel will be $ 650
Therefore Other costs per month /per room is 650/4 $162.50 Total cost per month/per room 46.87+162.50 $209.37 Considering 20 working days in a month Our cost per room/per day is 209.37/20 $10.47 Total cost 4 rooms/per month $875 ================================================================ Room Sales Minimum sale price each room/per day $ 45
Sale price for 3 rooms/per day 3x45 $135
Minimum sales in restaurant/per day $75
Total sales per day 135+75 $210 Considering 2o working days a month Total sales of hotel for the month 20x210 $4200
Profit per month 4200- 875 $3325
lender.occupational_info:
The proposal - Hotel for rent.
Cost of the hotel for the entire year is $ 2250 Cost of the hotel for 3 years 6x2250 $ 6750 The hotel consists of 3 rooms and 1 restaurant Average cost of each room will be 187.5 per month $ 46.87 Other costs each month includes staff salary, electric Equipments, incidental expenses, license cost For the entire hotel will be $ 650 Therefore Other costs per month /per room is 650/4 $162.50 Total cost per month/per room 46.87+162.50 $209.37 Considering 20 working days in a month Our cost per room/per day is 209.37/20 $10.47 Total cost 4 rooms/per month $875 ================================================================ Room Sales Minimum sale price each room/per day $ 45 Sale price for 3 rooms/per day 3x45 $135 Minimum sales in restaurant/per day $75 Total sales per day 135+75 $210 Considering 2o working days a month Total sales of hotel for the month 20x210 $4200 Profit per month 4200- 875 $3325

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can. And it's nice to see how my money is being put to good use.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in people and because I believe in Kiva. It's a simple but awesome idea. The initial 'seed money' you invest grows into fruit bearing assets for the borrower. They repay and your money can then be re lent to someone else. The cycle continues. If you spread your money across multiple borrowers by providing only a small amount of their loan request, you hedge your risk.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Assist in organizing an after-school program at a public middle school.

lender.name: Myrna & Darrin
lender.loan_because: I care about helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I do research and marketing for five spanish radio stations.

lender.name: Игорь
lender.loan_because: i need the working capital
lender.occupational_info: direct sales The goods for the house and cosmetics

lender.name: Paul and Alison
lender.loan_because: we can and we care

lender.name: Matthias
lender.loan_because: I know how privileged I am to live the life that I already have. I think it´s a good and effective chance to help people who live in poverty for no reasons.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and want to be a teacher in English and Geography, 2 interesting subjects! I know how important sustainable development is!

lender.name: Maritza
lender.loan_because: I love to support people's entrepreneurial activities

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs worldwide. Wether it's a chosen lifestyle or a necessity to survive, I admire your courage.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I've spent 4 years living in Honduras as an international teacher and have seen the poverty and how much of a difference a loan can make to help people get off the ground with their business!

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: sharing and participating in people's lives via Kiva.org is incredible!
lender.occupational_info: I am Toronto-based a documentary filmmaker.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to provide an opportunity for a person to be empowered so that they can truly be responsible for their actions and no longer be a slave to charity.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself - so I recognize the challenges and rewards of owning/running your own company. It requires hope and faith to start your own business, but it takes courage to keep it going. I want to recognize and support women across the world doing the same thing.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create semi-precious gemstone jewelry by hand. I sell my pieces through my own website, at trunk shows, and to retail outlets on a wholesale basis.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I love to help people and I belive everyone should have a chance to suceed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and learn.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: I create fabric paintings from textiles that I have collected from sewing clothing and created by batiking and dyeing over the years

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the chance to improve their lives by allowing them to pursue their own initiatives
lender.occupational_info: I am a National Park Service Archeologist who works at the Grand Canyon

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can and it feels good.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel really good and i can help other people.
lender.occupational_info: it's fun, but only when i'm writing. otherwise, it's boring and or way too easy. writing isn't like that.

lender.name: Moira and Len
lender.loan_because: I believe we make a difference one individual at a time. STOP Poverty, together we can!

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: It's good to help.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make things that inform and entertain people.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: i care.
lender.occupational_info: I organize work for a group of computer programmers. We make web pages, and make our living by helping other people and institutions save energy.

lender.name: Dave
lender.occupation: Futurist on a Free Enterprise Mission
lender.loan_because: It is my life's work to train, guide and encourage entrepreneurs. I am passionate about free enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I am Chief Creativity Officer of FreeEnterpriseWarriors.com, a web-based business dedicated to activating and supporting the global entrepreneurial transformation. I also serve as Free Enterprise Warriors' lead trainer and write regular blogs on www.davejenks.com and www.FreeEnterpriseWarriors.com.

lender.name: Linnea
lender.loan_because: I like helping people, and this is a brilliant use of my money!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer and a scholar.

lender.name: lynde
lender.loan_because: OUR FAMILY GIVES GOD AND JESUS ALL THE PRAISE AND GLORY FOR OUR LIVES TOGETHER, OUR EVERYTHING!

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I think we all have a responsibility to help each other when we can.
lender.occupational_info: My first job is working as a cashier at an electronics store. I also have my own confectionery business, making and selling fudge and candies.

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I get to shape young minds.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I want to support the dreams of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. I also like to paint.

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!
lender.occupational_info: Chief Financial Officer who works with affordable housing providers & Native communities.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: English as a Second Language teacher

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people whose kidneys don't work well to know what to eat to make them feel better.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: partnered together with Qurbanali Imanov, my loan recipient, something good can happen.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student preparing for college.

lender.name: Damian & Tricia Rinaldi
lender.loan_because: We can, and because we like what Kiva's doing to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Scott C. Myers
lender.loan_because: I have only been able to reach this point in my life because of the help provided by others.
lender.occupational_info: I work inside the writer's room on a television series. I have found the job I have always wanted, and would like for others to be able to do the same.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I was stunned by how little most people wanted to borrow. With a few days of pocket change we are able to help someone change his/her life.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I love helping other business owners, especially those less fortunate.

lender.name: Brant
lender.loan_because: ...I want to help where I can.

lender.name: LM Ridgecrest
lender.loan_because: We care about our fellow beings.

lender.name: Adelaide Uni ICX Team
lender.loan_because:
We are members of AIESEC at Adelaide University. This team consists of Rowan, Melvin, Damon, Guru, Buvanes & Adam.
We are all passionate about entrepreneurship and economics. We believe everyone should have the opportunity to run their own business. Where as we have people we can rely on for capital, we understand this is not the same all over the world. As students, we hope to help other aspiring entrepreneurs by contributing what we can to raising money.
lender.occupational_info:
We are students across a variety of backgrounds, including economics, accounting, law and international studies
We will be contributing based on the performance KPIs set by the team (number of phone calls, networking and meetings we have).

lender.name: Şükrü
lender.loan_because: I have 2 kids. My smal kid is autistic I need it for him educations

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: When such a small amount by our standards can make such a huge difference in some places, how could I not?
lender.occupational_info: My old bones walk around a construction site helping stronger, more capable people organize their work activities.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: i care ♥

lender.name: Marcelle
lender.loan_because: I'm an evangelist for entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: I write business plans for people who work from home.

lender.name: Josh
lender.occupational_info: http://www.kiva.org/about/fellows-program

lender.name: Jyotirmaya
lender.loan_because: "The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others." - Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I am working towards making information more useful.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: We must pass along what we have been given, whether it is education, love, or in this case, a loan to give a person a fresh start.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer with the Nevada State Parks (Las Vegas) & my husband, Heinrich, & I travel whenever we can. Heinrich & I are on the right in the picture, my brother & his girlfriend are on the left.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: a little does a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a freelance voice actor and writer. I also raise funds to help children in the Philippines pay for tuition to go to school.

lender.name: JENNIFER
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to empower people!

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I'm helping people try and come out of poverty when I am living a privelaged lifestyle!

lender.name: Laurence
lender.loan_because: It's much better than investing in overpriced coffee.
lender.occupational_info: Just too much of it.

lender.name: bret
lender.loan_because: I have traveled throughout SE Asia and I understand the impact my loans have on those who receive them.
lender.occupational_info: I provide companies with financial and business planning advice

lender.name: Tiana and Christie
lender.loan_because: Mother and daughter...we wanted to share and help, especially after our recent trip to Indonesia together.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I love supporting anyone who works hard to chase their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and also do physiology research in a very large university in Texas, USA. I study how the body, and especially how the skeleton, adapts to exercise or lack of exercise (as during spaceflight).

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I think that it is each person's responsibility to support the causes they believe in by voting with their energy when they have time and their money when they lack other energy--in their country and around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make decisions and I organize and build the resources needed to to execute those decisions.

lender.name: Kriszta
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of Kiva and it is the least I can do.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want women in developing countries to have more of a chance to thrive and do great things.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently involved in business systems support and training in hong kong - very exciting...

lender.name: billy
lender.loan_because: I need loan for my mother house repairing , because until now I am still live at my mother house.
lender.occupational_info: I am an employee in a catering company in jakarta , indonesia. I am only as a staff operation .

lender.name: Jayar
lender.loan_because: The new web has finally brought my generation into civil engagement - we are excited to contribute to civic life and collaborate with people worldwide! When I heard about Kiva, I immediately knew I wanted to be involved. I am both glad and proud that the Kiva freethinking community is helping put to rest the belief that non-theists are amoral and selfish.
lender.occupational_info: I am a case manager and community aide for individuals who have acquired head injuries. I help them to organize and execute life goals to develop positive everyday routines aimed at increasing their independence.

lender.name: Loré
lender.loan_because: I've had it hard myself, and I know what it's like to just need a little more than you have- I was lucky enough to have something come through for me- it's only right for me to pay that kind of thing forward.

lender.name: riozelle
lender.loan_because:
I want to give back for being blessed.
"Give a person a fish and you will feed them for a day: Teach them to fish and you feed them for a lifetime."

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Microfinance really works. God has called us to serve others, so I have found a small way to help change lives in a sustainable way.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I used to live in Zimbabwe and I miss being in Africa and want to contribute something back. I also learned to cook and love food while living there so wanted to support some people involved in cooking and entertaining others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell shoes online for adidas.

lender.name: Noel Oco
lender.loan_because:
I am blessed by our Lord God with amazing opportunities and I want to share my success to those who need it the most. I believe that the main purpose and reason to become successful is to be able to make a positive impact in the world. God bless you all in your journey.
"Trust the past to the Mercy of God, the present to His Love, and the future to His Providence." - St. Augustine
lender.occupational_info: I am preparing to enter a contemplative monastery in the near future. Pray for us. Praise the Lord Jesus Christ!

lender.name: Margot
lender.occupational_info: I am going to college to major in international relations and hopefully work in the Foreign Service or as a translator.

lender.name: Ajey
lender.loan_because: humanity

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities and this sustainable charity deserves support.
lender.occupational_info: I study engineering full time at the local university and work once or twice a week at my old high school helping the kitchen prepare meals for the boarding students.

lender.name: Sagun
lender.loan_because: I want loan to devlop my restaurant business.
lender.occupational_info: We want to introduce you to a new taste which is reflective of unique Nepalese Indian cuisine. Born in the mountain of the Himalayas this has become a favorite style of food throughout the world. The difference is in the seasoning. Using the finest vegetables, meats and seafoods, full flavored fancy spices and modest Nepali herbs combine to provide a culinary experience.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all entitled to a happy & rewarding life as we are all children of the same source. I lend because i can & in the hope it will be useful to those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I study forms of alternative healing, the human body/brain, science & all things spiritual. I am open to ideas new & old & believe we are all connected at a deep & spiritual level.

lender.name: Filipe Moura
lender.loan_because: Everyone need a hand one day in his life, let me help while i can

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: it only takes one person to make a difference

lender.name: Hank
lender.occupational_info: i doodle with various sensor systems to help monitor surface and ground water quality

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large Computer Services company. My job is to run services for our clients and to keep them happy.

lender.name: Paulo
lender.loan_because: i think that we must help someone that wants to work hard to survive and don't have the meanings for that.If i can...
lender.occupational_info: stressful,interesting,and we learn everyday something new.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs that truely need assistance in less fortunate countries. This program is well respected and I wanted to be part of this great cause.
lender.occupational_info: I work full time at a leading Honda Powerhouse Dealership. I own and operate a small Online Business selling parts for late model Honda Products.

lender.name: Daureen
lender.loan_because: I prefer to invest in individuals, especially those trying to improve the standard of living and education of their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: "Do unto others as you would have done to you."

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: People deserve opportunities.

lender.name: Darcelle Runciman
lender.loan_because: I care about people, and want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I own an online business that promotes a balanced world, mind, and heart. I also mentor small business owners and entrepreneurs on how to develop their businesses.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.occupation: Supervisor Of Guest Services and Operations

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: When we travel over the world we meet so many nice people. If we loan money we can do something back for people who need it!

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to fulfill their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a college in a library.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I am.

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Christian Nilsson
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best and most efficient way to give aid to the third world

lender.name: Jurgen
lender.loan_because: On our bicycle trip we encountered many friendly people who had little income. Lots of them wanted to work but had no chance. Micro credit can give that chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses to meet environmental standards.

lender.name: Flo Critt Geog. Class
lender.loan_because: We have studied microfinance in Geography class and thought it would be interesting to begin to fund someone in another part of the world. We are going to focus on women since we are a school for girls.
lender.occupational_info: We are a high school for pregnant and parenting teen girls in Denver, CO.

lender.name: Megan and Brandon
lender.loan_because: Although we had looked at Kiva before, and thought that micro-lending was an amazing opportunity to reach out into the world, it was our brother-in-law Nathan who finally got us started with a gift certificate this holiday season. Thanks, Nate!
lender.occupational_info: Brandon is an artist and a professor of Fine Art at a university, and Megan is a student.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: it's not enough to say that more people should help out and care in this world. you have to actually be the one to do it.
lender.occupational_info:
my job: i sit around all day keeping track of documents. it's very boring.
my life: i paint pictures and i volunteer at Pets Alive in Middletown, NY on the weekends.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of doing as much as possible to help others out, even if it is a little loan. Hopefully the availability of it spreads some love.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have a desire for all of us to improve our standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves the purchasing of products and services from developing countries. I have seen and experienced firsthand much of what I read about on Kiva.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.. We should focus on doing the next right thing, not doing the next thing right..
lender.occupational_info: Hours of tiresome tediousness intersparsed with moments of shear terror..

lender.name: Cinna
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great and simple way to make a difference in the world and give these entrepreneurs a fair chance of succeeding.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business as a graphic designer and production artist.

lender.name: Alese
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help women in other countries!

lender.name: Rotary Club of Rocklin/Loomis Basin
lender.loan_because: we want to foster sustainable, economic prosperity to the poor but highly motivated entrepreneurs worldwide
lender.occupational_info: We are a community service club that wants to improve our world both locally and internationally.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.occupation: Kiva Fellows Program Intern/Server at Limon

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. I hope it creates a positive impact!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a homebuilder.

lender.name: Mathieu
lender.loan_because: Micro credit is the best way to give other people a chance in life!
lender.occupational_info: Passions: Growing Trees and Plants, Backpacking in South America

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: together we can truly make a positive difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: I hope to empower all of us to be less dependent on corporations and politicians; and to make a better world for our children!
lender.occupational_info: I teach computer and IT skills to students in grades K-8. I coordinate our school's efforts to integrate technology into the regular classroom curriculum.

lender.name: Ufirst
lender.occupational_info: United First Financial pioneered the Money Merge Account system, which that combines powerful financial education with dynamic online tracking software,. UFirst is changing the financial landscape for thousands of individuals and families.

lender.name: Andrei
lender.loan_because: the only way we are going to progress as humans is by helping each other, leaving apart differences and starting to develop a real friendly, social planet.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: My primary goal is for the money to get to the folks who need it with little or no administrative costs eroding the good the funds can do!
lender.occupational_info: I design risk protection programs through insurance and training both online and in person so employers can focus on their primary goals and not worry about problems, lawsuits, or unexpected costs interfering with their livelihoood.

lender.name: jackie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: raised a family alone and am now retired.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: You'd help me, too, right?

lender.name: Robert & Toos
lender.loan_because: this really helps people get their own business off the ground, which helps them to be proud of who they are and what they do.
lender.occupational_info: I help large corporations get the maximum use and value out of open source software. Open source software is software that everybody can see the source code for and can use for free.

lender.name: Tilman
lender.loan_because: with a comparatively small amount, I can help people to build existances. 25$ can't buy nearly as much in my country (Germany) as in many other countries... So it's better to lend it to people where it has more momentum...
lender.occupational_info: I am working in a company building walls for toilets and other sanitary equipment and build the frames for those walls...

lender.name: Korey
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Develop software.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I've seen that micro-lending is effective in helping to help alleviate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to expand the reach of microfinance.

lender.name: Kimberly M.
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to give.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated college and helping other young students in low-income high schools with high immigrant populations go to college too.

lender.name: Byte
lender.loan_because: Byte doneert een deel van haar omzet aan Kiva. Samen met onze klanten kunnen we de wereld een klein beetje beter proberen te maken.
lender.occupational_info: Byte levert hosting diensten aan webdesigners en MKB bedrijven. We doen dit met PHP/MySQL (Joomla, Magento).

lender.name: Luis Neves
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to see everyone become successful and because it feels good

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I make awesome software

lender.name: Jayson
lender.loan_because: Small business is what makes a real difference and it is exciting to see how the money is put to use.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people that need it. And it's not just a handout, since they're paying you back - it's a sign of faith and encouragement.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a third party logistics company as a truckload broker.

lender.name: Mileen
lender.loan_because: as a former entrepreneur, I know first hand what it takes to start, operate, maintain, and grow a business. I've had help along the way so why shouldn't anyone else who wants to do the same?
lender.occupational_info: Having recently sold a business, I'm deciding what it is that I want to do next. If everything falls into place, then screenwriting and music producing will be next.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people. We have all needed help at one time.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from law enforcement. .

lender.name: Duncan and Whitney
lender.occupation: Husband is seminary student & wife is church staff
lender.loan_because: $25 here in the States is a night out at the movies. In another country, it is a new business, a new life.
lender.occupational_info:
Duncan: I am at school to study and prepare to be a Christian minister.
Whitney: I print newsletters and other paper information for my church.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupation: trainer/consultant on disability issues & ADA law

lender.name: Carson
lender.loan_because: Access to investment capital is one of the biggest problems facing developing countries. And it makes us feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a factory that makes computer chips that go into PC's, cell phone, cameras, and other electronic devices. I help manage the teams that work around the clock to make the chips.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: MJR
lender.occupational_info:
In an effort to assist with employment in this recession. I have developed a Network of Consultants. However, it is difficult to raise funding for pre-project activities. One small project can employ from 20 to 25 persons and larger projects several hundreds.
I am trying to raise funds so that we can access more projects. Need to raise a total of US$25,000.00. Will repay loan over 12 months period and return will be 50%. So if you lend us 1000 dollars - we repay you $1,500 over the one year period.
I hope to be able to lend on this Network, some time in the near future...
Thanks and God Bless....

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I want to put my tax refunds that I get from my other charity giving to good use.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: they asked

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: "Ubi caritas et amor, Deus ibi est" (from an ancient Christian hymn)

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: there's a difference between a helping hand and a handout...
lender.occupational_info: I provide health care to women, including helping them to deliver their babies.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: In the processing of learning about this organization and how it works.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I think that this is one way to do that. I think that this program gives people a hand up, not a hand out and something to be proud of.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a forest fire fighter, basically I help to put out brush and forest fires in British Columbia and have been for the past 9 years. It is a physical job, can be dangerous but definately fun and challenging. I work with great people and have had numerous opportunities in my life because of my employment.

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I work for coastal ocean research programs at Scripps Institution of Oceanography.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: those who have more should give more.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to help people with mental problems be able to better deal with those problems and improve their lives.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to, and to make a difference.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to help people empower themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Carlo
lender.loan_because: i can help a tiny bit

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I like giving someone a hand up--and all the people I see on Kiva seems to be working very hard to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes. Right now, it can be very painful because so many people are losing their homes to foreclosure. I like it when people are happy about buying new homes, not when they're losing their homes.

lender.name: Nyamjin
lender.loan_because: I hope my little contribution helps to make a better country and a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for MFI. I love my job because I tour through hundred's of different people's businesses, dreams, hopes and lifes.

lender.name: Sidik
lender.loan_because: I care about real economic for all people.
lender.occupational_info: just ordinary employee

lender.name: Ellen Bossink
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help somebody by lending money. I hoop to help more people when my loan is repayed.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I'd like to contribute to other people's success.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the transportation department of a privately owned chemical and automotive products company.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I CAN ~ !!!

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. We need to share our blessings and wealth
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer visiting hospitals, and retirement homes for the elderly and I also help the justice system decide cases involving parenting of you children of separated parents.

lender.name: Eve
lender.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities to those who want to provide for themselves and thier families. I love the idea of lending because it's not a hand-out. I can only imagine the pride and satisfaction the borrower will have once he/she has repayed the loan. It's a win-win!
lender.occupational_info: I assist clients with investing thier money in stocks, bonds and other investments.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to, I think this is a great program and I want to support it and all of the hard working entrepreneurs who are a part of it. I wish them all success.
lender.occupational_info: I create messages that make people aware of what my clients sell and why they might want to buy their products. This includes commercials on television, advertisements in magazines and on billboards, websites, etc.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I've seen how a lack of banking and capital has effected some places I've visited, and I think Kiva has the right approach to micro-finance.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for helps schools offer courses to students over the internet. Right now mostly in the US, and mostly to college students, but that is changing to all grades and schools in other countries.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: while I can afford to do so, I will match repaid loans with new funds, so repaying a loan will increase the help that I give others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics at Barnard College in New York City. Our students come from 39 countries.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor for animals mostly dogs and cats.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.occupational_info: Training in Youth Work and mentoring programs for at-risk youth

lender.name: Tanja
lender.loan_because: This is the little step I can make to change the world to the better, hopefully only the first step, with many more to come...

lender.name: Dynamically Speaking
lender.loan_because: Proverbs 29:7 The righteous considereth the cause of the poor.
lender.occupational_info: We are Toastmasters who think we should lend a helping hand.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in our world. Leding money to people who are in need, and making a positive impact on their lives is my overall goal.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student attending high school

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance at prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: My company makes software & hardware codecs for video compression.

lender.name: KEN
lender.loan_because: WE ARE ALL IN THIS TOGETHER
lender.occupational_info: MY WORK IS TO USE LIGHTING TO MAKE BEAUTIFUL EVENTS SUCH AS WEDDINGS AND CONCERTS.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I need help getting into heaven.
lender.occupational_info: I am a studying how best to conserve our natural resources before the Republicans use them all up.
